The inclusion of specific biblical passages, such as Isaiah 9:6-7, Daniel 7:13-14, and Zechariah 9:9-10, strengthens the argument and provides a clear demonstration of the continuity between the Old and New Testaments.

The response also effectively addresses the concern of grasping the continuity of the biblical narrative regarding salvation.
